name: Luxurious Living in Ibrahimpur: Brand New 3BHK Apartment with Modern Amenities on the 5th Floor for Sale!
details: Discover the epitome of comfort and style in this brand new 1,275 sqft apartment located on the 5th floor in the heart of Ibrahimpur. This meticulously designed home features 3 spacious bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, an open drawing and dining area, a well-equipped kitchen, and not one, but three balconies offering breathtaking views. Elevate your lifestyle with the convenience of a lift, generator backup, dedicated car parking, and round-the-clock security guard services. Don't miss the opportunity to make this your dream home, where modern living meets tranquility!

details: Unlock the potential of your business with our state-of-the-art 17,000 square feet warehouse, strategically located in Ashulia. This fully compliant space comes equipped with a robust 300kw electricity connection, soaring 30-foot ceilings, and the convenience of 4/5 parking spaces right in front of the shed. With ample loading and unloading space, this facility is the ideal choice for both factory and warehouse operations. Secure this premium industrial space now and elevate your business to new heights!

name: 2-Acre Land Sale in Narail, on Dhaka - Benapole Highway Road
details: An exceptional opportunity awaits! Two acres of prime land are up for sale, strategically located just four kilometers from Sadar Upazila in Narail, along the bustling Dhaka-Benapole highway road. The icing on the cake? An upcoming ICT park within three kilometers from the property. As an added advantage, Eknek has secured approval to upgrade the Dhaka-Benapole highway road to a six-lane marvel, enhancing connectivity and accessibility. Interested buyers are invited to seize this promising investment opportunity. The cost of each decimal land BDT 4,30,000/-. Contact us now for more details and to secure your piece of this thriving location!
address: Narail on Dhaka - Benapole Highway Road

details: Unlock the potential of a 6 bigha industrial land in Rupganj, Narayanganj, strategically positioned just 25km from Gulshan.
